mapper.sql: messafe_id, staff_id, messafe_content, messafe_man, messafe_phone, messafe_time, messafe_state
mapper.select: select a.*,b.staff_name from messafe_info a,staff_info b where a.staff_id = b.staff_id and a.messafe_id = #{messafeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.*,b.staff_name from messafe_info a,staff_info b where a.staff_id = b.staff_id
and a.messafe_phone = #{messafePhone}
mapper.insert: insert into messafe_info (messafe_id, staff_id, messafe_content, messafe_man, messafe_phone, messafe_time, messafe_state) values (#{messafeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messafeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messafeMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messafePhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messafeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{messafeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into messafe_info
messafe_id,
staff_id,
messafe_content,
messafe_man,
messafe_phone,
messafe_time,
messafe_state,

mapper.update:
update messafe_info
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
messafe_content = #{messafeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
messafe_man = #{messafeMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
messafe_phone = #{messafePhone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
messafe_time = #{messafeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
messafe_state = #{messafeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where messafe_id = #{messafeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update messafe_info set staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, messafe_content = #{messafeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, messafe_man = #{messafeMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, messafe_phone = #{messafePhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, messafe_time = #{messafeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, messafe_state = #{messafeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where messafe_id = #{messafeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
